name: Honey-Ginger Grilled Salmon
author: Kerri Skrudland
summary: This recipe is simple to make, yet impressive. The marinade gives the fish a sweet taste that my family goes nuts for! If it's too cold out to grill it, you also may broil it.
directions: In a large self-closing plastic bag, combine ginger, garlic, soy sauce, orange juice, honey, and green onion; mix well
Place salmon in bag and seal tightly
Turn bag gently to distribute marinade
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil grate
Remove salmon from marinade, shake off excess, and discard remaining marinade
Grill for 12 to 15 minutes per inch of thickness, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork
